meanings.definition: To tie or bind with a ligature.
meanings.sent1: I will ligate the rope around the box to secure it.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon will ligate the blood vessels during the operation.
meanings.sent3: I tried to ligate my shoelaces together for a funny prank, but it didn't work.
meanings.sent4: The ligated branches of the tree intertwined like a beautiful dance in the wind.
meanings.sent5: She carefully ligated the papers together to create a neat stack.
